name: Do a Turtle Roll
description:
A simple platformer, created as I continue to force myself to make games.

The new input system wasn't working in the WebGL build and I didn't test it soon enough. Very sad.

Development blog + source: https://github.com/YourWaifuIsALie/gmtk-jam-2022

Total expected play time: 5 minutes

Music credits:
